title: Bug 112458: Property Editor Displays Layout Items' Properties in Master Page Viewer
description: The Property Editor continues to display the properties of layout items when switching to the Master page viewer.
OB: When switching to the Master Page viewer, the Property Editor still displays the properties of layout items. This can confuse customers who may mistakenly believe they are in the Master Page Editor and unintentionally set properties without clicking on the Master Page viewer first.
EB: Upon switching to the Master Page viewer, the expected behavior is for the Property Editor to reflect the properties of the Master Page. The actual result is that it still shows the properties of the layout items, which is not as expected.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to a page with layout items.
3. Switch to the Master Page viewer.
